name: Clockwork Dreams
description:
Submission for the Brackey's 2022-1 Game Jam. The theme was: It Is Not Real

DESCRIPTION

Play as Bot-Bot, a malfunctioning robot who has strayed too far from the assembly line and has found himself in a surreal mechanical world. Scan the environment to learn what is real, and what is not... Is Bot-Bot really malfunctioning? Or is this a robot's journey to consciousness?

CONTROLS

ActionKeyboardControllerMoveWASDLeft StickJumpSpaceA (South Button)ScanEX (West Button)

TEAM

3D Design: Kristians Dzenis
Coding: Callum Shanahan, Piotr Gburzynski
Level Design: Callum Shanahan, Kristians Dzenis, Piotr Gburzynski
Music: Nathan Sharples
Sound Design: Braiden Simpson

FINAL WORDS

Liked it? Got feedback for us? We'd love to hear it! Leave us rating or comment. :)
